attributes.action: Reduce the ever increasing petrol and diesel prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prices of petrol and diesel are rising almost daily. How can the government justify this? As consumers we are are being squeezed in all directions this is one where we could be given a break by reducing the profits being made and help business and industry in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
